column5: Saw this in the CTC preview flyer. On sale for $99.99 Reg $139.99 I think someone copied Brian's ice fishing sled?  Dan.  http://www.canadiantire.ca/en/pdp/wood-wagon-and-sleigh-0823027p.0823027.html
Don't expect it to be very sturdy??  I bought it for my Grand-son and wasn't really impressed with the quality, especially the railings around it. pretty flimsy.
Good to know. Nothing worse then buying something and then unknowingly have to rework it to make it usable.  Dan.

I have a slightly older version of this - it is nearly useless for ice fishing once there is snow on the lake. The short skis break through any type of crusty snow, and then the tips drop down and catch in the hole.
$100 too much for that ski's are too short make your own for $20

Saw this in the CTC preview flyer. On sale for $99.99 Reg $139.99 I think someone copied Brian's ice fishing sled?  Dan.  http://www.canadiantire.ca/en/pdp/wood-wagon-and-sleigh-0823027p.0823027.htm  Just checked my bank account,,,,,,,,,,,,,, NOPE, No royalties. LOL

Sister in law scored two of these for me the other night in Costco. Based on price I told her to just buy them as they came c/w spring shock tow bar, cover and to my surprise when she dropped them off they even have UHMW strips already installed. Bought for less than the price of just the tow bar and cover generally sell for!
